title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Carve out some quiet time alone to reassess your career plans and goals today. You could embark on an elaborate retreat to engage in self-reflection, but you dont necessarily have to go to such extreme measures now to reap the benefits of meditation. Its challenging to grasp the big picture when youre so entangled in the hubbub of a daily grind. Stepping back and taking a bird-eyes view of your current situation enables you to see whats truly important. Once you readjust your perspective, you will soar higher and farther than before. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
